title: 11/12/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 11/12/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Brady Quinn about last night's game and this weekend's College Football matchups. How big of a game is it for Oklahoma? Basketball Hall of Famer Charles Barkley calls in to discuss the Lakers, Scottie Pippen and doing a DP show from his house. And Panthers writer Joe Person explains why the team decided to bring Cam back.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
